mapper.insert: INSERT INTO school( school_logo, school_name, school_address, school_slogan, school_jingdu, school_weidu, school_price, school_tel, school_area, school_status, school_license) VALUES( #{school_logo}, #{school_name}, #{school_address}, #{school_slogan}, #{school_jingdu}, #{school_weidu}, #{school_price}, #{school_tel}, #{school_area}, #{school_status}, #{school_license})
mapper.update: UPDATE school SET school_browse=school_browse+1 WHERE school_id=#{school_id}
UPDATE school SET school_distance=#{1} WHERE school_id=#{0}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM school WHERE school_area=#{2} AND school_status=1 ORDER BY school_distance LIMIT #{0},#{1}
SELECT * FROM school WHERE school_area=#{2} AND school_status=1 ORDER BY school_browse DESC LIMIT #{0},#{1}
mapper.update: UPDATE school SET school_name=#{school_name}, school_address=#{school_address}, school_slogan=#{school_slogan}, school_jingdu=#{school_jingdu}, school_weidu=#{school_weidu}, school_price=#{school_price}, school_tel=#{school_tel}, school_area=#{school_area}, school_status=0 WHERE school_id=#{school_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM school WHERE school_name LIKE #{school_name}
